trans-unit.source: Getting Started with Azure Active Directory (.NET Projects)
trans-unit.target: Getting Started with Azure Active Directory (.NET Projects)

trans-unit.source: How to get started using Azure Active Directory in Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: How to get started using Azure Active Directory in Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Getting Started with Azure Active Directory (.NET Projects)
trans-unit.target: Getting Started with Azure Active Directory (.NET Projects)

trans-unit.source: All controllers in your project were adorned with the **Authorize** attribute.
trans-unit.target: All controllers in your project were adorned with the **Authorize** attribute.

trans-unit.source: This attribute will require the user to be authenticated before accessing these controllers.
trans-unit.target: This attribute will require the user to be authenticated before accessing these controllers.

trans-unit.source: To allow the controller to be accessed anonymously, remove this attribute from the controller.
trans-unit.target: To allow the controller to be accessed anonymously, remove this attribute from the controller.

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the permissions at a more granular level, apply the attribute to each method that requires authorization instead of applying it to the controller class.
trans-unit.target: If you want to set the permissions at a more granular level, apply the attribute to each method that requires authorization instead of applying it to the controller class.

trans-unit.source: To add a the SignIn/SignOut controls to your view, you can use the **_LoginPartial.cshtml** partial view to add the functionality to one of your views.
trans-unit.target: To add a the SignIn/SignOut controls to your view, you can use the **_LoginPartial.cshtml** partial view to add the functionality to one of your views.

trans-unit.source: Here is an example of the functionality added to the standard **_Layout.cshtml** view.
trans-unit.target: Here is an example of the functionality added to the standard **_Layout.cshtml** view.

trans-unit.source: (Note the last element in the div with class navbar-collapse):
